CustomField.description: Formula field - If the related Intake's Status = Referred Out AND Intake Vendor contains Saddle Rock AND the task owner equals the 1st Questionnaire User AND Questionnaire User is not blank/null THEN 1, ELSE 0
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Credit_Type__c, '1st Questionnaire User') && ISPICKVAL(Intake__r.litify_pm__Status__c, 'Referred Out') && CONTAINS(Intake__r.Intake_Vendor__r.Name, 'Saddle Rock') && OwnerId = Intake__r.X1st_Questionnaire_User__c && NOT(ISBLANK(Intake__r.X1st_Questionnaire_User__c)), 1, 0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field - If the related Intake's Status = Referred Out AND Intake Vendor contains Saddle Rock AND the task owner equals the 1st Questionnaire User AND Questionnaire User is not blank/null THEN 1, ELSE 0
CustomField.label: Questionnaire Credit
